author: Chris Blake
title: India's 1.3 billion locked down as US reaches virus aid deal
description: NEW DELHI (AP) — The world's largest democracy went under the world's biggest lockdown Wednesday, with India's 1.3 billion people ordered to stay home in a bid to stop the coronavirus pandemic,...
content: NEW DELHI (AP) The worlds largest democracy went under the worlds biggest lockdown Wednesday, with Indias 1.3 billion people ordered to stay home in a bid to stop the coronavirus pandemic, while in the U.S., lawmakers and the White House agreed on a massive $… [+6707 chars]
